AUDIT_WARN: The audit log lists the changes and actions in your system chronologically.
RESTORE_WARN:
Minimum CRM backs up all your data daily. It offers you the versions of your backed up data in a one-week time frame so that you can restore in case of any need. Thus, you can return to the version of your Minimum CRM data on the date you want from the options.

Warning : When you restore the version you selected, all records and data that were entered to the Minimum CRM after the date of the version to be restored will be lost. The system will continue to work with the records and data in the restored version.

Important Note : Minimum CRM performs daily version backup at 00:00 every day according to the company time zone set in General Company Settings.
RESTORE_ATTENTION_TEXT:
Heads Up! You are about to make a very important decision!

When you restore the version you selected, all records and data that were entered to the Minimum CRM after the date of the version to be restored will be lost.

There is no chance to undo this after restoring to the previous version.

The system will continue to work with the records and data in the restored version.
RESTORE_CONFIRM_TITLE: Do you confirm restoring to the selected version?
RESTORE_CONFIRM_TEXT: There is no chance to undo this process after restoring to the version.
RESTORE_CONFIRM_INPUT_LABEL: Please type in Minimum CRM to confirm:
RESTORE_CONFIRM_INPUT_HELP: Your entry was incorrect. If you want to continue, please write Minimum CRM with the upper and lower case letters as shown in the example.
BACKUP_WARN:
Minimum CRM backs up all your data daily. It offers you the backups of your data in a one-week time frame so that you can download them given necessary. You can download and access the backup of your system data in the CSV format.

Important Note: Your backups will be sent daily to the e-mail address you registered to Minimum CRM.

Important Note 2: If you have trouble viewing foreign characters when you open your exported CSV file, you may need to re-save the file in your local text encoding.

Important Note 3: Minimum CRM performs daily version backup at 00:00 every day according to the company time zone set in General Settings under Company Settings.
RECOVERY_INPROGRESS_MSG:
The system is being restored to its previous version.
The process will be completed in a few minutes. When the restore is completed, you will be directed back to the system.
COMPANY_TIMEZONE_INFO: This is the time zone used by the entire company. The selected time zone will be used in back - up version arrangements.
PERSON_TIMEZONE_INFO: This is the personal time zone setting. Record times and the times on detail screens shall be set according to the selected time zone. Also, timed events and activities will trigger according to the selected time zone.
CHANGE_PASSWORD_SUCCESSFUL: Your password has been changed successfully.
PASSIVE_ACCOUNT: Your account has been deactivated. Please consult your administrator.
UPDATE_PLAN_DESC_ONE: In the plan update area, you can purchase new user accounts in addition to your current total of account seats. Your newly purshased account seat will be charged at the rate of the period up to the account renewal date on your company's current plan. In the next period, the payment of your newly purshased accounts will continue in accordance with our current main plan.
UPDATE_PLAN_TITLE_TWO: Reducing the Number of Account Seats to the Number of Active Users:
UPDATE_PLAN_DESC_TWO: You can reduce the total number of account seats in your current plan to the number of active users. Thus, you will not have to pay for account seats that will not be used in the next period.
FOR_THE_NEXT_PERIOD: Payment chart for the next period
TARGETED_TOTAL_NUMBER: Targeted total number of account seats

CARD_INSERTED: Your New Card Has Been Added Successfully.
BUY_MESSAGE_2: *Monthly or annual payments, if additional user is requested; requests 1-15 will be paid for the whole month (including 15), while requests 16-16 will be paid half of the month
CARD_INFO_TEXT: All credit card transactions occur on Iyzico payment systems. You credit card details are never shared with us or stored on our systems.

SYNCHRONIZATION_MODAL_CONFIRM: In case the synchronization is terminated, the added files will be removed from the records and it will not be possible to access (see) via Minimum CRM.
CLOUD_STORAGE_SYNCHRONIZATION_COMMENT: You can synchronize your company’s Google Drive account with Minimum CRM in order to attach your documents and photos to your records with peace of mind. Thus, your documents remain in your company’s cloud space while being attached to the relevant Minimum CRM records and are always accessible. Only users with admin level authorization can synchronize your company’s Google Drive account with Minimum CRM.
FILE_INFO: For files that cannot be downloaded, try enabling drive third-party cookies.

download_the_app_text: “Google Authenticator” uygulamasını indirin ve telefonuza kurun.
scan_qr_code_text: Aşağıdaki QR kodunu “Google Authenticator” uygulaması ile tarayın.
download_pdf_text: Devam etmeden önce lütfen Kurtarma Kodunuzu yedekleyin ve bu kodu kimseyle paylaşmayın. Kurtarma kodunuzu PDF olarak indirip saklayabililrsiniz.
recovery_code_text: Telefonunuz kaybolur veya uygulama silinirse, Google yetkilendirmenize geri dönmek için bu koda ihtiyacınız olacaktır. Lütfen kodu yedekleyin.
verification_code_text: “Google Authenticator” uygulamasından üretilen kodu aşağıya girin ve “Doğrulama Kodunu Aktif Et” butonuna basın
two_step_verification_text: “Google Authenticator” uygulamasında üretilmiş olan kodu girin.
